name: Zoom! (itch)
description:
Controls: WASD or arrow keys. Press "right" to begin.

Music by Ross Al Ghul https://soundcloud.com/rossalghul

Reaction speed game with simple randomisation components. I wanted to challenge myself to polish something to a "finished" state for this procjam.

Built from "scratch" (using unity) to also coincide with 1gam this month!

Polished and completed android mobile version now available for download here or on the Google Play Store!
